item.title: Monstascape - Devo
item.dc:creator: @poopsicle100 poopsicle100
item.description:
@poopsicle100 wrote:

Ok I Got Hella Board Waiting for playernt to finally pick a source so i picked devo 2.4 because of idk i just like dit. then he just kept saying he like this and that and never got to work on it. so rather than trashing it, since its got a little more work done than devo 2.4 itsself i think i should just release the server + client.

Credits(Almost Forgot)
*anyone who wants them i don’t really give a fuck, so anyone i used a tut + helped


Server Features:

[ul][]Full Karamjam (tzhaar + Shops)
[]Working Slayer Ring + Glory
[]Correct Defending Animations
[]Part Theiving
[]Some Smithing Done
[]Few Bug Fixes In Combat
[]Godsword Making + Dismantling
[]Full Spirit Shield Making
[]Start Of Slayer (slayer tower + Dungeon)
[]Some Other Things But To Lazy To Type
[]start of barrows - never finished
[]Connects To Only My Client
[*]all client items are noteable(well have noted versions…)[/ul]

Pictures(Quick)

Bah Fuck It Those Are Old And I Aint Taking Time To Take Some Pictures Of Something that Has Few More Features Than Devo 2.4

This iS the barrows method…never got finished

public void BarrowsCoffins(boolean Spirit, int Id, int X, int Y, int H) { sendMessage("You Search The Sarcophagus....."); /**If The Monster has Not Been Killed, Has 5 Kc, Is Not Summoned, And There Is No Tunnel, This Tomb Will Be A Tunnel*/ if (!Spirit && bkc == 5 && !tunnel && !Summoned) { sendMessage("....And Find A Tunnel!"); tunnel = true; Brother = Id; NpcDialogue = 15; NpcDialogueSend = false; /**If The Monster Has Not Been Killed, Has Less Than 5 Kc, There Is No Tunnel, And Its Not Summoned THere is 20% Chance That This Will be A Tunel*/ } else if (!Spirit && bkc < 5 && !tunnel && !Summoned && misc.random(5) == 1) { sendMessage("....And Find A Tunnel!"); tunnel = true; Brother = Id; NpcDialogue = 15; NpcDialogueSend = false; /**if already killed nothing is found*/ } else if(Spirit || Summoned) { sendMessage("....You Find Nothing Of Intrest"); /**If This Is The Tunnel Then It Will Allow you To Enter*/ } else if(Brother == Id && tunnel) { NpcDialogue = 15; NpcDialogueSend = false; /**If Its Not Summoned, The Brother Will Spawn.*/ } else if(!Summoned && !Spirit){ sendMessage("....The Spirit Rises Out Of Its Tomb"); //Summon(Id, X, Y, H); = doesn't work Summoned = true; } }

its in there im just making sure you know what your looking for.

Server & Client - http://www.mediafire.com/?sharekey=d85e30375c9e4dd0c2b435915e8821d7e04e75f6e8ebb871
[font=Verdana]If Somone Can Upload To Anywhere Else I Would Apreciate It Because Uppit Won’t Let me And Neither Will FileFront.[/font]

[font=Verdana][size=10pt]Please Note The Thing With The Client Is That D Bow Isn’t Put In Correctly And Class8 + Class5 Is Pretty Much Empty.(no Skillcapes)[/size][/font]

To Allow All CLients Comment This Line Out

[CODE] if (!CanConnect) {
disconnected = false;
println(“Client Rejected”);
}

[/CODE]
[font=Verdana][size=10pt]
Why My Compile + Runserver Are .cmd? Well I Fucked Up My Computer And Now Thats All I Can Run Because My .bat Files Aren’t Being Open COrrectly[/size][/font]

Read full topic
